column4: Hi  I lost my NetworkManager panel applet when I rebooted after installing pppoeconf, and I can't even find an applet package in Synaptic.  Anyone know how I can resote it?
it should be in the notification area
I had the same problem. it would not show up in the indicator applet (still have that problem) but showing up in the notification area applet

humm... then I am out of ideas. but I remember when I googled that problem that there were many similar problems. including in the /etc/network/interfaces (is that the file?) to set the eth0 wlan0 or whatever interface it is to auto
